summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2878, for the improvement of Valley Street, from Westlake Avenue North to Minor Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by constructing armored concrete curbs where necessary; by the construction or reconstruction of all sewers or water mains with such appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district; by the construction of reconstruction of concrete sidewalks where necessary; and providing for the necessary surface drainage,; under Ordinance No. 34987 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
